verses.verse: Now in the <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H702>fourth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of this <S%H2320>month<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were <S%H622>assembled<s%> with <S%H6685>fasting<s%>, and with <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%>, and earth upon <S%H127>them<s%>.

And the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H914>separated<s%> themselves from all <S%H1121>foreigners<s%>, and <S%H5975>stood<s%> and <S%H3034>confessed<s%> their <S%H2403>sins<s%>, and the <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>.

And they stood <S%H6965>up<s%> in their <S%H5977>place<s%>, and <S%H7121>read<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%> a fourth <S%H7243>part<s%> of the <S%H3117>day<s%>; and another fourth <S%H7243>part<s%> they <S%H3034>confessed<s%>, and <S%H7812>worshipped<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%>.

Then stood <S%H6965>up<s%> upon the <S%H4608>stairs<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, <S%H3442>Jeshua<s%>, and <S%H1137>Bani<s%>, <S%H6934>Kadmiel<s%>, <S%H7645>Shebaniah<s%>, <S%H1138>Bunni<s%>, <S%H8274>Sherebiah<s%>, <S%H1137>Bani<s%>, and <S%H3662>Chenani<s%>, and <S%H2199>cried<s%> with a <S%H1419>loud<s%> <S%H6963>voice<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%>.

Then the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, <S%H3442>Jeshua<s%>, and <S%H6934>Kadmiel<s%>, <S%H1137>Bani<s%>, <S%H2813>Hashabneiah<s%>, <S%H8274>Sherebiah<s%>, <S%H1941>Hodiah<s%>, <S%H7645>Shebaniah<s%>, and <S%H6611>Pethahiah<s%>, <S%H559>said<s%>, Stand <S%H6965>up<s%> and <S%H1288>bless<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> from <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> to <S%H5769>everlasting<s%>; and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> be thy <S%H3519>glorious<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%>, which is <S%H7311>exalted<s%> above all <S%H1293>blessing<s%> and <S%H8416>praise<s%>.

Thou art <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, even thou <S%H6213>alone<s%>; thou hast made <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> of <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, with all their <S%H6635>host<s%>, the <S%H776>earth<s%> and all things that are <S%H3220>thereon<s%>, the seas and all that is in <S%H2421>them<s%>, and thou preservest them <S%H6635>all<s%>; and the host of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> worshippeth <S%H7812>thee<s%>.

Thou art <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%>, who didst <S%H977>choose<s%> <S%H87>Abram<s%>, and broughtest him <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H218>Ur<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldees<s%>, and <S%H7760>gavest<s%> him the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham<s%>,

and <S%H4672>foundest<s%> his <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H539>faithful<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3772>thee<s%>, and madest a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with him to <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%>, the <S%H2850>Hittite<s%>, the <S%H567>Amorite<s%>, and the <S%H6522>Perizzite<s%>, and the <S%H2983>Jebusite<s%>, and the <S%H1622>Girgashite<s%>, to <S%H5414>give<s%> it unto his <S%H2233>seed<s%>, and hast <S%H6965>performed<s%> thy <S%H1697>words<s%>; for thou art <S%H6662>righteous<s%>.
And thou <S%H7200>sawest<s%> the <S%H6040>affliction<s%> of our <S%H1>fathers<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and <S%H8085>heardest<s%> their <S%H2201>cry<s%> by the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>Sea<s%>,

and <S%H5414>showedst<s%> <S%H226>signs<s%> and <S%H4159>wonders<s%> upon <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, and on all his <S%H5650>servants<s%>, and on all the <S%H5971>people<s%> of his <S%H776>land<s%>; for thou <S%H3045>knewest<s%> that they dealt <S%H2102>proudly<s%> against <S%H6213>them<s%>, and didst get thee a <S%H8034>name<s%>, as it is this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

And thou didst <S%H1234>divide<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5674>them<s%>, so that they went through the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> on the dry <S%H3004>land<s%>; and their <S%H7291>pursuers<s%> thou didst <S%H7993>cast<s%> into the <S%H4688>depths<s%>, as a <S%H68>stone<s%> into the <S%H5794>mighty<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%>.

Moreover in a <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of <S%H6051>cloud<s%> thou <S%H5148>leddest<s%> them by <S%H3119>day<s%>; and in a <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> by <S%H3915>night<s%>, to give them <S%H215>light<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> wherein they should <S%H3212>go<s%>.

Thou camest <S%H3381>down<s%> also upon <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai<s%>, and <S%H1696>spakest<s%> with them from <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and <S%H5414>gavest<s%> them <S%H3477>right<s%> <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> and <S%H571>true<s%> <S%H8451>laws<s%>, <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and <S%H4687>commandments<s%>,

and madest <S%H3045>known<s%> unto them thy <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H7676>sabbath<s%>, and <S%H6680>commandedst<s%> them <S%H4687>commandments<s%>, and <S%H2706>statutes<s%>, and a <S%H8451>law<s%>, <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>,

and <S%H5414>gavest<s%> them <S%H3899>bread<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%> for their <S%H7458>hunger<s%>, and broughtest <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> for them out of the <S%H5553>rock<s%> for their <S%H6772>thirst<s%>, and <S%H559>commandedst<s%> them that they should go <S%H935>in<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> which thou hadst <S%H3027>sworn<s%> to give <S%H5414>them<s%>.
But they and our <S%H1>fathers<s%> dealt <S%H2102>proudly<s%> and <S%H7185>hardened<s%> their <S%H6203>neck<s%>, and <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> not to thy <S%H4687>commandments<s%>,

and <S%H3985>refused<s%> to <S%H8085>obey<s%>, neither were <S%H2142>mindful<s%> of thy <S%H6381>wonders<s%> that thou <S%H6213>didst<s%> among <S%H7185>them<s%>, but hardened their <S%H6203>neck<s%>, and in their <S%H4805>rebellion<s%> <S%H5414>appointed<s%> a <S%H7218>captain<s%> to <S%H7725>return<s%> to their <S%H5659>bondage<s%>. But thou art a <S%H433>God<s%> ready to <S%H5547>pardon<s%>, <S%H2587>gracious<s%> and <S%H7349>merciful<s%>, <S%H750>slow<s%> to <S%H639>anger<s%>, and <S%H7227>abundant<s%> in <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%>, and forsookest them <S%H5800>not<s%>.

Yea <S%H6213><s%>, when they had made them a <S%H4541>molten<s%> <S%H5695>calf<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, This is thy <S%H430>God<s%> that brought thee <S%H5927>up<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and had <S%H6213>wrought<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5007>provocations<s%>;

yet thou in thy <S%H7227>manifold<s%> <S%H7356>mercies<s%> <S%H5800>forsookest<s%> them not in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>: the <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H5493>departed<s%> not from over them by <S%H3119>day<s%>, to <S%H5148>lead<s%> them in the <S%H1870>way<s%>; neither the <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> by <S%H3915>night<s%>, to show them <S%H215>light<s%>, and the <S%H1870>way<s%> wherein they should <S%H3212>go<s%>.

Thou <S%H5414>gavest<s%> also thy <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> to <S%H7919>instruct<s%> <S%H4513>them<s%>, and withheldest not thy <S%H4478>manna<s%> from their <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and <S%H5414>gavest<s%> them <S%H4325>water<s%> for their <S%H6772>thirst<s%>.

Yea <S%H705><s%>, forty <S%H8141>years<s%> didst thou <S%H3557>sustain<s%> them in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, and they <S%H2637>lacked<s%> <S%H8008>nothing<s%>; their clothes waxed not <S%H1086>old<s%>, and their <S%H7272>feet<s%> swelled <S%H1216>not<s%>.

Moreover thou <S%H5414>gavest<s%> them <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> and <S%H5971>peoples<s%>, which thou didst <S%H2505>allot<s%> after their <S%H6285>portions<s%>: so they <S%H3423>possessed<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon<s%>, even the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%>, and the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5747>Og<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>.

Their <S%H1121>children<s%> also <S%H7235>multipliedst<s%> thou as the <S%H3556>stars<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and <S%H935>broughtest<s%> them into the <S%H776>land<s%> concerning which thou didst <S%H559>say<s%> to their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, that they should go <S%H935>in<s%> to possess <S%H3423>it<s%>.

So the <S%H1121>children<s%> went <S%H935>in<s%> and <S%H3423>possessed<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>, and thou <S%H3665>subduedst<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%>, and <S%H5414>gavest<s%> them into their <S%H3027>hands<s%>, with their <S%H4428>kings<s%>, and the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, that they might <S%H6213>do<s%> with them as they <S%H7522>would<s%>.

And they <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H1219>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>, and a <S%H8082>fat<s%> <S%H127>land<s%>, and <S%H3423>possessed<s%> <S%H1004>houses<s%> <S%H4392>full<s%> of all good <S%H2898>things<s%>, <S%H953>cisterns<s%> <S%H2672>hewn<s%> <S%H3754>out<s%>, vineyards, and <S%H2132>oliveyards<s%>, and <S%H3978>fruit<s%> - <S%H6086>trees<s%> in <S%H7230>abundance<s%>: so they did <S%H398>eat<s%>, and were <S%H7646>filled<s%>, and became <S%H8080>fat<s%>, and <S%H5727>delighted<s%> themselves in thy <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2898>goodness<s%>.

Nevertheless they were <S%H4784>disobedient<s%>, and <S%H4775>rebelled<s%> against <S%H7993>thee<s%>, and cast thy <S%H8451>law<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> their <S%H1458>back<s%>, and <S%H2026>slew<s%> thy <S%H5030>prophets<s%> that <S%H5749>testified<s%> against them to <S%H7725>turn<s%> them again unto <S%H6213>thee<s%>, and they wrought <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5007>provocations<s%>.

Therefore thou <S%H5414>deliveredst<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of their <S%H6862>adversaries<s%>, who <S%H6887>distressed<s%> <S%H6256>them<s%>: and in the time of their <S%H6869>trouble<s%>, when they <S%H6817>cried<s%> unto <S%H8085>thee<s%>, thou heardest from <S%H8064>heaven<s%>; and according to thy <S%H7227>manifold<s%> <S%H7356>mercies<s%> thou <S%H5414>gavest<s%> them <S%H3467>saviours<s%> who <S%H3467>saved<s%> them out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of their <S%H6862>adversaries<s%>.

But after they had <S%H5117>rest<s%>, they <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5800>thee<s%>; therefore leftest thou them in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of their <S%H341>enemies<s%>, so that they had the <S%H7287>dominion<s%> over <S%H7725>them<s%>: yet when they returned, and <S%H2199>cried<s%> unto <S%H8085>thee<s%>, thou heardest from <S%H8064>heaven<s%>; and <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H6256>times<s%> didst thou <S%H5337>deliver<s%> them according to thy <S%H7356>mercies<s%>,

and <S%H5749>testifiedst<s%> against <S%H7725>them<s%>, that thou mightest bring them again unto thy <S%H8451>law<s%>. Yet they dealt <S%H2102>proudly<s%>, and <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> not unto thy <S%H4687>commandments<s%>, but <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against thine <S%H4941>ordinances<s%>, (which if a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%>, he shall <S%H2421>live<s%> in <S%H5414>them<s%>), and withdrew the <S%H3802>shoulder<s%>, and <S%H7185>hardened<s%> their <S%H6203>neck<s%>, and would not <S%H8085>hear<s%>.

Yet <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> didst thou bear with <S%H5749>them<s%>, and testifiedst against them by thy <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> <S%H3027>through<s%> thy <S%H5030>prophets<s%>: yet would they not <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H238>ear<s%>: therefore <S%H5414>gavest<s%> thou them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> of the <S%H776>lands<s%>.

Nevertheless in thy <S%H7227>manifold<s%> <S%H7356>mercies<s%> thou <S%H6213>didst<s%> not make a full <S%H3617>end<s%> of <S%H5800>them<s%>, nor forsake <S%H2587>them<s%>; for thou art a gracious and <S%H7349>merciful<s%> <S%H410>God<s%>.

Now <S%H430>therefore<s%>, our God, the <S%H1419>great<s%>, the <S%H1368>mighty<s%>, and the <S%H3372>terrible<s%> <S%H410>God<s%>, who <S%H8104>keepest<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%>, let not all the <S%H8513>travail<s%> seem <S%H4591>little<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4672>thee<s%>, that hath come upon <S%H4428>us<s%>, on our kings, on our <S%H8269>princes<s%>, and on our <S%H3548>priests<s%>, and on our <S%H5030>prophets<s%>, and on our <S%H1>fathers<s%>, and on all thy <S%H5971>people<s%>, since the <S%H3117>time<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>.
Howbeit thou art <S%H6662>just<s%> in all that is <S%H935>come<s%> upon <S%H6213>us<s%>; for thou hast dealt <S%H6213>truly<s%>, but we have done <S%H7561>wickedly<s%>;

neither have our <S%H4428>kings<s%>, our <S%H8269>princes<s%>, our <S%H3548>priests<s%>, nor our <S%H1>fathers<s%>, <S%H6213>kept<s%> thy <S%H8451>law<s%>, nor <S%H7181>hearkened<s%> unto thy <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and thy <S%H5715>testimonies<s%> wherewith thou didst testify against <S%H5749>them<s%>.

For they have not <S%H5647>served<s%> thee in their <S%H4438>kingdom<s%>, and in thy <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H2898>goodness<s%> that thou <S%H5414>gavest<s%> <S%H7342>them<s%>, and in the large and <S%H8082>fat<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> which thou <S%H5414>gavest<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7725>them<s%>, neither turned they from their <S%H7451>wicked<s%> <S%H4611>works<s%>.

Behold <S%H5650><s%>, we are servants this <S%H3117>day<s%>, and as for the <S%H776>land<s%> that thou <S%H5414>gavest<s%> unto our <S%H1>fathers<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> thereof and the <S%H2898>good<s%> <S%H5650>thereof<s%>, behold, we are servants in it.

And it yieldeth <S%H7235>much<s%> <S%H8393>increase<s%> unto the <S%H4428>kings<s%> whom thou hast <S%H5414>set<s%> over us because of our <S%H2403>sins<s%>: also they have <S%H4910>power<s%> over our <S%H1472>bodies<s%>, and over our <S%H929>cattle<s%>, at their <S%H7522>pleasure<s%>, and we are in <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6869>distress<s%>.

And yet for all this we <S%H3772>make<s%> a <S%H548>sure<s%> <S%H3789>covenant<s%>, and write <S%H8269>it<s%>; and our princes, our <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, and our <S%H3548>priests<s%>, seal unto <S%H2856>it<s%>.
